title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 932.1 - Purpose of Regulations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 932.1 - Purpose of Regulations

State Regulations

The purpose of these regulations is to effectuate the
conflicts of interests provisions of the Public Officers Law and to provide an
approval procedure for outside activities by Policy Makers, heads of State

Agencies, and Statewide Elected Officials. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
932.1

Adopted

New

York State Register July 22, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
